hero.title: Welcome to Sailing Banja
hero.subtitle: A unique project of the Harmony Active Longevity Association
hero.description: Harmony starts with simple things: sauna, sea, unity.
advantages.title: Our Advantages
advantages.location.title: Unique location
advantages.location.description: We are located right on the shore of the Baltic Sea at Linnahall in Tallinn.
advantages.beach.title: Comfortable coastal area
advantages.beach.description: Our beach is the perfect place for winter and summer swimming. It offers a comfortable environment, privacy and safety.
advantages.longevity.title: Support for active longevity
advantages.longevity.description: We are a project of the Harmony Association, which promotes the idea of a long and quality life.
advantages.sauna.title: Vivid sailing sauna
advantages.sauna.description: A sail style sauna with a wood stove heats up very quickly.
advantages.spa.title: SPA treatments
advantages.spa.description: We have wellness and relaxing spa rituals.
advantages.warmth.title: Friendliness and coziness
advantages.warmth.description: We have warmth not only in the sauna, but also between people from all over the world.
